name: The Prince's Road
description: An ancient fairy road that winds through the heart of Dolmenwood, said to have been walked by the Cold Prince himself in ages past. The path gleams silver in moonlight, and strange music can sometimes be heard drifting through the mist.
atmosphere: The air shimmers with an ethereal light, and shadows move independently of their casters. The silence is broken only by distant, otherworldly music.
sights: Stars that seem far too close

doors.name: The Hollow Oak Door
doors.description: A massive hollow oak tree with a doorway carved into its trunk. The doorway glows faintly at twilight.

doors.name: The Standing Stone Circle
doors.description: A circle of ancient standing stones. At midnight during a full moon, a doorway appears between the two tallest stones.

doors.name: The Frozen Spring
doors.description: A spring that never thaws, even in summer. Leaving an offering of silver coins in the water opens the way.

monster_entries.description: A gang of murderous redcaps, their caps freshly dyed with blood.
Flickering lights that attempt to lead travelers astray.
monster_entries.behavior: Deceptive - tries to lure travelers off the path

monster_entries.description: A patrol of moss dwarfs, suspicious of outsiders.
monster_entries.behavior: Wary - will question travelers but not attack unprovoked

monster_entries.description: A fairy noble traveling with 1d4 attendants.
monster_entries.behavior: Capricious - may help or hinder based on whim

monster_entries.description: The spirits of mortals who died on the road, trapped between worlds.
monster_entries.behavior: Mournful - seek help but may attack if refused

monster_entries.description: Twisted plant creatures that hunt the edges of the path.
monster_entries.behavior: Predatory - stalks and attacks weak travelers

monster_entries.description: White hounds with red ears, hunting something unseen.
monster_entries.behavior: Focused - ignore travelers unless interfered with

monster_entries.description: The dreaded Wild Hunt passes by - seek cover immediately!
monster_entries.behavior: Catastrophic - all must hide or be swept up in the hunt

location_entries.name: The Crossroads Shrine
location_entries.description: A small shrine where fairy roads intersect. Offerings left here may grant boons.

location_entries.name: The Weeping Willow
location_entries.description: A massive willow tree that appears to weep silver tears. Resting here restores 1d6 HP but advances mortal time by 1d4 days.

location_entries.name: The Merchant's Rest
location_entries.description: A clearing with a small inn that appears and disappears. A goblin merchant offers strange wares.

location_entries.name: The Bone Bridge
location_entries.description: A bridge made of interlocking bones spans a chasm of swirling mist. Something stirs below.

location_entries.name: The Garden of Statues
location_entries.description: A garden filled with lifelike statues of travelers. Are they stone, or something else?

location_entries.name: The Mushroom Ring
location_entries.description: A ring of giant toadstools, some large enough to shelter beneath. Spore clouds drift lazily.

special_rules: Iron items cause 1d6 damage per turn to their carriers
Cold iron weapons deal double damage to all creatures here
Characters who sleep on the road must save vs Spell or dream true prophecies
